InventorySelector.Selector: /api/v1/search/SearchItems?$filter=(((IndexMotypes eq storage.BaseVolume) and ( ObjectType ne storage.NetAppLun)) or (IndexMotypes eq storage.BaseStorageContainer) )&$orderby=Name&$select=Name

Body.Description: Adding Target FlashArray for Creating a replication connection between the current FlashArray and the specified Target array.
Body.Label: Add FlashArray As Target For Replication
Body.Name: AddFlashArrayAsTargetForReplication

InputDefinition.Description: Replication Target Array Name
InputDefinition.Label: Replication Target FlashArray Name
InputDefinition.Name: TargetFlashArrayName

InputDefinition.Description: Replication addresses is for replication and applicable only when replication transport is set to ip. NOTE: Provide the list of IP address as array of strings using doublequotes
InputDefinition.Label: Replication Addresses
InputDefinition.Name: ReplicationAddresses

InputDefinition.Description: Replication type. Valid values are async-replication and sync-replication.
InputDefinition.Label: Replication Type
InputDefinition.Name: ReplicationType

InputDefinition.Description: The protocol used to transport data between the local array and the remote array. Valid values are ip and fc.
InputDefinition.Label: Replication Transport
InputDefinition.Name: ReplicationTransport

InputDefinition.Description: The connection key of the target FlashArray.
InputDefinition.Label: Connection key
InputDefinition.Name: ConnectionKey

OutputDefinition.Description: Replication addresses is for replication and applicable only when replication transport is set to ip. Provide the list of IP address as array of strings.
OutputDefinition.Label: Replication Addresses
OutputDefinition.Name: ReplicationAddresses

OutputDefinition.Description: Replication type. Valid values are async-replication and sync-replication.
OutputDefinition.Label: Replication Type
OutputDefinition.Name: ReplicationType

OutputDefinition.Description: The protocol used to transport data between the local array and the remote array. Valid values are ip and fc.
OutputDefinition.Label: Replication Transport
OutputDefinition.Name: ReplicationTransport

Body.Description: Create a new Protection group for pure FlashArray.
Body.Label: Create New protection Group On FlashArray
Body.Name: NewPureProtectionGroup

InputDefinition.Description: Protection Group name to be created on the Pure FlashArray
InputDefinition.Label: Protection Group name
InputDefinition.Name: ProtectionGroupName

InputDefinition.Description: The names of the Protection Group or Protection Group snapshot to be copied into a new or existing protection group. If the Destination PG and all of its Volumes already exists, please incldue overwrite parameter to true
InputDefinition.Label: Protection Group source names
InputDefinition.Name: ProtectionGroupSourceNames

InputDefinition.Description: If set to true, overwrites an existing volume during a volume copy operation. If set to false or not set at all and the target name is an existing volume. the volume copy operation fails.The name of the Protection Group or Protection Group snapshot to be copied into a new or existing protection group. If the Destination PG and all of its Volumes already exists, please incldue overwrite parameter to true
InputDefinition.Label: Protection Group Source overwrite
InputDefinition.Name: ProtectionGroupSourceNamesOverwrite

OutputDefinition.Description: Name of the Protection Group created
OutputDefinition.Label: Protection Group
OutputDefinition.Name: ProtectionGroup

Body.Description: Creates a point-in-time snapshot of the contents of a protection group. Protection group snapshots capture the content of all volumes on the source array for the specified protection group at a single point in time.
Body.Label: New Pure protection Group Snapshot
Body.Name: NewProtectionGroupSnapshot

InputDefinition.Description: Protection Group Snapshot suffix must be between 1 and 63 characters (alphanumeric and '-') in length and begin and end with a letter or number. The suffix must include at least one letter or '-'.
InputDefinition.Label: Protection Group Snapshot Suffix
InputDefinition.Name: ProtectionGroupSnapshotSuffix

InputDefinition.Description: If set to true, applies the local and remote retention policy to the snapshots.
InputDefinition.Label: Apply Retention
InputDefinition.Name: ApplyRetention

InputDefinition.Description: If set to true, destroys and eradicates the snapshot after 1 hour.
InputDefinition.Label: For Replication
InputDefinition.Name: ForReplication

InputDefinition.Description: If set to true, queues up and begins replicating to each allowed target FlashArray after all earlier replication sessions for the same protection group have been completed to that target. The replicate and replicate_now parameters cannot be used together.
InputDefinition.Label: Replicate
InputDefinition.Name: Replicate

InputDefinition.Description: If set to true, replicates the snapshots to each allowed target FlashArray. The replicate and replicate_now parameters cannot be used together.
InputDefinition.Label: Replicate Now
InputDefinition.Name: ReplicateNow

OutputDefinition.Description: Name of the Protection Group created
OutputDefinition.Label: Protection Group Name
OutputDefinition.Name: ProtectionGroupName

OutputDefinition.Description: If set to true, applies the local and remote retention policy to the snapshots.
OutputDefinition.Label: Apply Retention
OutputDefinition.Name: ApplyRetention

OutputDefinition.Description: If set to true, destroys and eradicates the snapshot after 1 hour.
OutputDefinition.Label: For Replication
OutputDefinition.Name: ForReplication

OutputDefinition.Description: If set to true, queues up and begins replicating to each allowed target FlashArray after all earlier replication sessions for the same protection group have been completed to that target. The replicate and replicate_now parameters cannot be used together.
OutputDefinition.Label: Replicate
OutputDefinition.Name: Replicate

OutputDefinition.Description: If set to true, replicates the snapshots to each allowed target FlashArray. The replicate and replicate_now parameters cannot be used together.
OutputDefinition.Label: Replicate Now
OutputDefinition.Name: ReplicateNow

Body.Description: Add volume as a memeber in to protection group. Members that are already in the protection group are not affected.
Body.Label: Add Volumes to Pure Protection Group
Body.Name: AddVolumesToProtectionGroups

InputDefinition.Description: Source Volume which needs to be added in to the group.
InputDefinition.Label: Source Volume
InputDefinition.Name: VolumeName

OutputDefinition.Description: Protection Group in which the Volume has been added.
OutputDefinition.Label: Protection Group
OutputDefinition.Name: ProtectionGroup

OutputDefinition.Description: Source Volume which needs to be added in to the group.
OutputDefinition.Label: Source Volume
OutputDefinition.Name: VolumeName
